articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Framework Laptop 12 review: I’m excited to see what the 2nd generation looks like - Ars Technica
articles.description: A sturdy, thoughtful, cute design that just can’t compete in its price range.

articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Adobe’s Firefly comes to iOS and Android - TechCrunch
articles.description: Adobe is launching its Firefly mobile app on iOS and Android for consumers to create AI-powered media
articles.content: Adobe has been on a quest to attract users to its platform for their AI needs. The company in April launched a redesigned Firefly web app that lets users use Adobe’s own Firefly image- and video-gene… [+1241 chars]
